de.mrapp.android.adapter.decorator

Class ViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • de.mrapp.android.adapter.decorator.ViewHolder

  • public class ViewHolder
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
    A view holder, which provides references to previously referenced views in order to reuse them.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder

        itemView

      Creates a new view holder.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ViewHolder

        public ViewHolder(View parentView)
        Creates a new view holder.
        Parameters:
        parentView - The view, the view holder is associated with, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

    • Method Detail

      • getParentView

        public final View getParentView()
        Returns the view, the view holder is associated with.
        Returns:
        The view, the view holder is associated with, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null

      • getView

        public final View getView(@IdRes
                          int viewId,
                          int viewType)
        Returns the view, which belongs to a specific resource ID. If the view has already been referenced, the reference, which is stored in the view holder, will be reused. Otherwise the method findViewById(int):View of the given parent view is used to reference the view.
        Parameters:
        viewId - The resource ID of the view, which should be returned, as an Integer value. The ID must be a valid resource ID of a view, which belongs to the given parent view
        viewType - The view type of the view, which should be returned, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        The view, which belongs to the given resource ID, as an instance of the class View or null, if no view with the given ID is available
